title: Valentine's Day Dinner at Prospect Lounge
description:
Dine at The Prospect Lounge at The Padre Hotel on February 14 and enjoy 5 decadent courses highlighting the most romantic meals from around the world. 

Enjoy a candlelit, romantic Valentine's Day dinner, live music and a complimentary gift. Reservations are required.

$75/person, add a wine pairing for $40/person. Reservations are required.

Ignite the passion with Sweet Romance packages available for every room type all month long. Includes rose petal turndown service, chocolate covered strawberries, and sparkling wine.
short_description: Share 5 romantic courses at The Prospect Lounge this Valentine's Day as we pair this evening of love with live music.
